div.style: border: 1px solid maroon; padding: 10px; background-color: #fffbf7; min-height: 160px;
div.p: This extension is primarily to support functionality such as differing FHIRPaths between versions for SearchParameter definitions, SubscriptionTopics, and extension contexts. Authors interested in using this extension for other purposes should check with FHIR Infrastructure about whether their intended use is safe/appropriate.
